plot: A crew of astronauts, including a scientist and a reporter, launch from England into outer space on a rocket which can serve as a satellite. Their mission is to test a new tritonium bomb, but after the bomb fails to repel itself from the ship, the crew has only a matter of hours to defuse or destroy the weapon before it explodes.
title: Satellite in the Sky
plot_es: A crew of astronauts, including a scientist and a reporter, launch from England into outer space on a rocket which can serve as a satellite.
